text: Soni yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka nsyene jwakwe Allah, soni chisimu chene pamasile pa twaachisyisye aŵala ŵana kupedwaga chitabu paujo penu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) ni jenumanja ŵakwe yanti mun'jogopani Allah, nambo naga nkufulu, basi (ni yenu), chisimu Allah iŵele Yakwe yaili kumawunde ni yaili petaka, ni aŵele Allah Jwakupata kwejinji Jwakulapilidwa kusyesyene
